vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.8; married to Hushim (H2366A), Baara (H1199) and Hodesh (H2321);
father of: Jobab (H3103J), Zibia (H6644), Mesha (H4331), Malcam (H4445A), Jeuz (H3263), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036), Elpaal (H0508)
§ Shaharaim = "double dawn"
a Benjamite, father of Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcham, Jeuz, Shachia, Mirma, Abitub, and Elpaal
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙哈連 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "兩個黎明"
一位便雅憫人, 是約巴, 洗比雅, 米沙, 瑪拉干, 耶鳥斯, 沙迦, 米瑪, 亞比突, 和
以利巴力 的父親 (代上 8:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沙哈连 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "两个黎明"
一位便雅悯人, 是约巴, 洗比雅, 米沙, 玛拉干, 耶鸟斯, 沙迦, 米玛, 亚比突, 和
以利巴力 的父亲 (代上 8:8)
